title: Viluppuram RDM Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 11 Village Assistant Posts
description: Theni Revenue and Disaster Management Department (Theni RDM) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 11 Village Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the Theni RDM Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates fill out the application forms befo...
